text: Adniellyson da Silva Oliveira (born September 7, 1995 in Paraibano), simply known as Silva, is a Brazilian footballer who plays for Tubarão as midfielder. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|State League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Conmebol !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan=3 valign="center"|Internacional |2015 |rowspan=2|Série A |6||0||colspan="2"|—||1||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||7||0 |- |2016 |0||0||1||0||0||0||colspan="2"|—||1Appearance(s) in Primeira Liga||0||2||0 |- !colspan="2"|Subtotal !6!!0!!1!!0!!1!!0!!colspan="2"|—!!1!!0!!9!!0 |- |rowspan=3 valign="center"|Atlético Goianiense |2016 |Série B |9||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||9||0 |- |2017 |Série A |9||0||11||0||1||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||21||0 |- !colspan="2"|Subtotal !18!!0!!11!!0!!1!!0!!colspan="2"|—!!colspan="2"|—!!30!!0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !24!!0!!12!!0!!2!!0!!colspan="2"|—!!1!!0!!39!!0 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:People from Maranhão Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série A players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série B players Category:Campeonato Brasileiro Série D players Category:Sport Club Internacional players Category:Atlético Clube Goianiense players Category:Sampaio Corrêa Futebol Clube players Category:Clube Atlético Tubarão players
